quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Evaluating whether the top view of the baseball and glove is present ensures the completion of one of the required perspectives.
quality_check_questions.question: Is there a top view of the baseball and glove included in the edited image?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Confirming the inclusion of a side view ensures another necessary perspective is shown.
quality_check_questions.question: Is there a side view of the baseball and glove included in the edited image?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Verifying the addition of a sectional view checks whether all required perspectives are present.
quality_check_questions.question: Is there a sectional view of the baseball and glove included in the edited image?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Ensuring the views remain suitable for product catalogs means they need to maintain clarity and detail.
quality_check_questions.question: Are the views of the baseball and glove clear and detailed enough for product catalogs or sports equipment manuals?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Checking if the original colors and textures of the baseball and glove are preserved ensures the authenticity of the objects is maintained.
quality_check_questions.question: Are the colors and textures of the baseball and glove accurately preserved in all views?
